1370: Reymar was born in In den Haeg in 1370.
Got married to Marie at age 32 in 1370.
Had a son with Marie, Blomart, at age 32.
1381: Had a daughter with Marie, Woltwigis, at age 43.
1372: Had a son with Marie, Lutgeri, at age 34.
1373: Had a daughter with Marie, Oderada, at age 35.
1374: Had a son with Marie, Reynerus, at age 36.
1376: Had a son with Marie, Rolekine, at age 38.
1377: Had a son with Marie, Salomon, at age 39.
1378: Lost son Rolekine when Rolekine was 3 years old.
